title: Workshop on Utilizing Generative AI in Post-Digital Architectural Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic architectural concepts and foundational digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Implementing a collaborative creative learning environment combining generative AI and analog methods for current architectural practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can describe a generative AI-based architectural design prototyping process with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can propose three or more innovative architectural solutions through creative collaboration between generative AI and humans.
Learners can draft AI utilization guidelines reflecting ethical issues in the post-digital era.

resources: Generative AI Tool Subscription License (Stable Diffusion, MidJourney, etc.)
Digital-to-Analog Conversion Kits (3D Printers, Laser Cutters, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
